website_summaries.verdict: These are modern reproductions of a classic Adidas design, and they have retained most of the original elements. A bit noisy, but fashionably "old school" style.
pros: Fashionably retro, but still a sport shoe at heart
cons: Suede does not handle wet conditions well
Stiff rubber sole is noisy while walking
Thin plastic tongue, not soft leather or suede

customer_reviews.title: Just shy of worthless
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Gazelles since the 90s. I still have a pair that are now over 10 years old, and they are far better constructed (and will continue to outlast) the pair I recently purchased. The thin faux leather shoe is of such poor quality that with every step you can clearly see your toes pushing and stretching out the faux leather. As someone who has a variety of shoes that are in excess of a decade old, I take care of my things. These shoes will be lucky to make it to March before falling apart. At least I didn't pay MSRP for these subpar Adidas shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I remember using these back in the day when I played competitive soccer, and how good of shoes they are. So I took the plunge 20+ years later and ordered another pair. They didn't disappoint. I'll buy more colors as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes , would buy more pairs but either Amazon dosen't have my size , color or the popular colors cost almost double.
customer_reviews.author: ken berlint

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice but disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes for about 2 weeks now. After wearing them nearly everyday, I think the fit and style of the shoes is relatively exceptional. On the other hand, I’m quite disappointed with paying $80 for a pair of shoes that now has a sole that is becoming unglued. There should be no reason for this since I’ve not worn the shoes vigorously at all. Even if I did, I think shoes at this price point should be able to withstand at least an average amount of strenuous wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Try a different type, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 2.5 stars if I could. Shoes came in nice condition and I love Adidas however, this is cheaply made. The tongue under the shoe laces feel like some form of plastic and constantly bends inside of the shoe irritating my toes. The insole sounds like old floor boards so with every step I take and I'm constantly making "creaking noises" everywhere I go. These are worth half the price I paid for unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: stacia

customer_reviews.title: One of the best sneakers i owned
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sneakers. They are absolutely comfortable and feet dont sweat in them . Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Always wear them
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, the old school throwbacks are my favorite. Can never find these in any shoe stores in the area not even on the ADIDAS website. The only thing I'll say though is the lip could've been better but the product description is very accurate and they're awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Britpop shoe for modern times.
customer_reviews.text: Sexy gold suede adidas trainers - yarg! Me n me mates is goin down ta pub and smash the place up!!
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Great retro sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers, order half a size down. I'm 9 1/2 in normal shoes, I ordered 9 in this sneakers and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo de la Riva

customer_reviews.title: No mistake
customer_reviews.text: What to say, classic look, great fit, great shoe! We will see how it performs, since I had it before and the soil was not so durable, but for now, I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Just an FYI - for Nikes, I wear 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI - for Nikes, I wear 10.5, for these a size 10 still give me plenty of room to wiggle my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because once the arrived they did have a couple of the stitching coming out not noticeable but non the less it was still there however the quality is still nice and comfortable definently would by another pair

customer_reviews.title: order at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: quality was not good when it got delivered it looks like someone used it already and has to return them

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are now my daily shoes, the sizing was exact to my current size and they look great.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, retro look
customer_reviews.text: A little tight and narrow when new but once broken in they are very comfortable. I wear an 11.5 and got a 12 since they don't come in half sizes, fit was fine. I wanted a flat soled gym shoe with a retro look and a more stylish look than Chuck Taylors so these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They fit my feet well. Also comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Juan gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this Gazelle shoes a lot and satisfied! Comfort...
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer&seller-IsaacYang

customer_reviews.title: On time and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i ordered and arrived on the day specified...great job and thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't much mystery when I bought these since they were to replace my boyfriends worn out pair. They were in perfect condition, the best price I could find, the right size arrived and was shipped quickly. What more can you ask for? This is where I'll buy the next pair when these are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Poor adherence in wet floor
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fits well, good quality, but the adherence in wet floor is horrible, really bad. The possibility to end with your butt in the street in a rainy day does not compensate the good things.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Quality for Life
customer_reviews.text: It was my college "go to" shoes for those long days in the the lab. I was a boot dude back in those days. I bought them bc I remember how comfortable they were back then n will definitely wear them when I do my yearly cruises n weekend outings.
customer_reviews.author: Emlago

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seems authentic but not come in an adidas box.... no signs of being worn nevertheless
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled touch on the ball
customer_reviews.text: I know that technically these are for leisure, but when it comes to playing indoor in them, the shoe molds to your foot like no other and permits amazing weight for passes. The lack of tread can be hazardous on a slick surface, but also serves for amazing control in dribbling moves.
customer_reviews.author: metrik7

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits just like the Adidas Campus II's that are now so hard to find. Looks almost identical as well minus the tread print and the tongue which is more of a plastic-vinyl. Excellent arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back because, like most "fashion sneakers," these were so narrow that they hurt and could possibly cause a Morton's neuroma. That's a tumor on your toe! It's benign, don't worry, and I in no way wish to imply that Adidas shoes cause tumors. I am simply stating that narrow shows in general and impact activities, even "fashion running," could cause this painful condition. Point being: if you find that you toe the line (I'm sorry, really, I'm sorry) between a D and a 2E, skip these shoes. They look nice though and seem moderately well constructed. Thus the 3 stars. An average shoe that might fit some and pinch others.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday sneakers! Fit great! The only problem was they squeaked for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: husband is so happy
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for fast delivery, and great product. My husband has been looking for the addidas gazelle's for years now and had been bummed that they where no longer being sold...so when I saw that they where on amazon and ordered them right away. My husband is so happy that I found these, they look great and overall we are both very happy. thank you
customer_reviews.author: H. December

customer_reviews.title: This was one of the best footwear purchases I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best footwear purchases I have ever made. First off, I saved about twenty bucks by buying them through amazon rather than the adidas store. The size was true and they are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I will say that they are very flat soled shoes and don't offer much in arch support. That isn't an issue for me, but if you need arch support it is something to consider. Overall I am ecstatic with this purchase and would buy them again once I wear this pair out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The pink Gazell in the room.
customer_reviews.text: Because you never know when you'll need a pair of pink Gazells to bring it all together.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As I was expecting comfort and fit and light shoes and good quality , thanks to amazon teams for fast and good service , all the best

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!  Great shoes! Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was right on... Adidas shoes have always been great for me.... They also hold up well under rough wear considering I wear them sometimes when taking long walks... Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macman

customer_reviews.title: The Adidas Originals-Gazzelle(Black/running White)
customer_reviews.text: "The Shoes are comfty,Great craftmanship The price was Great-"I did truly gots my monies worth"!

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and sent them right back after trying them on. The length was fine but these shoes are ultra narrow and constrictive. The padding on the underside of tongue of the shoe is ridiculously overstuffed and combined with a naturally narrow fit I couldn't wait to take them off. If you have feet that aren't on the narrow side of standard I'd recommend looking into something else. I wear Vans, Converse, and other brands just fine in standard (M) widths but these were just too snug to be anything resembling comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love gazelles
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, but it is one of those shoes you should go to a store first to try a pair because it is slimmer around the tip of the foot

customer_reviews.title: Adidas official
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 8, yellow . Came in official adidas box. Very nice shoe

customer_reviews.title: love these kicks
customer_reviews.text: Man, ive been looking for these sneaks for YEEEAARS lol , but yeah.....so i saw them and ordered them...and BAM, i got me some awesome sneakers !!! packaging was great, came in like 4 days, and with shipping n handle'n it was still cheaper to order em online here then paying for some adidas that arent really the ones you want in stores. buy them !!! NOW !!!! O.o

customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a bit long and narrow. I order half a size larger. The tongue squeaks a bit when you walk which is annoying. Hopefully it will wear off.

customer_reviews.text: This shoes are great, but if you got wide feet don't buy this because this shoes are very narrow.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away when I opened and it was better than what I saw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe, Fit is a Little Long and Narrow for Me.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of these shoes, and this is my forth pair over 20+ years. This particular pair is a little longer than the last, but still fit Ok. They also squeaked a little until I put some talcum powder on their tongues. I still love the looks of these shoes, but maybe not the most comfortable. If they're like the other pairs I've owned, they'll fit better as they wear in.
customer_reviews.author: Randy F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy fast delivery too
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy fast delivery too. Shoes were wrapped well, no scratches, marks or any other imperfections. Bought two pairs of these shoes, one was OG style and this one the difference was Gazelle written on the side of the shoes. I bought these as a gift for a Nieghbor Boy that got straight A's on his report card. I was going to send one pair back but ended up keeping both one as a gift the other is in the closet. Great product good company. You won't be disappointed. Would buy again. Thanks for reading. Reviews help consumers.
customer_reviews.author: joeyangel510

customer_reviews.title: Have own many pairs of these and love them very much
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wide foot this will take some time to break in. Have own many pairs of these and love them very much.

customer_reviews.text: He says they are very comfortable. They also clean up easily.

customer_reviews.title: high arches? shoe for you.

customer_reviews.text: My new Adidas Gazelle's fit true to size and the build quality is excellent. These shoes are just like what I wore in the 1970s--awesome!

customer_reviews.title: The size fit as expected and I love the classic look of the Adidas Gazelles

customer_reviews.title: love them

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Gazelles
customer_reviews.text: Typically B-boy shoes, good ankle/toe support, decent arch even though its not visible, only real drawback is the suede can get messed up pretty easy, make sure to use a suede protector.

customer_reviews.title: Stop emailing for feedback
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. The incessant emails constantly demanding feedback makes me question ever buying from Amazon again

customer_reviews.title: New School/Old School
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these since the late 80's and although the style/fit has changed over the years, it's still a quality shoe. I wear 8 1/2 mens and that's precisely what I ordered and the fit was perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, stylish and comfy. Be aware of the white bottoms and leather uppers, both of which are harder to keep looking clean.

I felt the sole and it had less cushing than vans. I have been wearing these shoes for years. I guess they don't care about quality anymore like craftman tools. China crap!!

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Gazelle Sneaker
product_meta.description: A premium take on the gazelle, these shoes come with a full premium leather upper that has a super-shiny finish. A gum rubber outsole adds to the vintage look.
feature_bullets: Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite sockliner
